ILLENIUM

ILLENIUM - One of Many Talented DJ's

ILLENIUM is a passionate DJ's who express his feelings through his music. Many of his listeners can relate to his songs.

ILLENIUM aka Nicholas D. Miller is an American musician, DJ, and record producer.He has released four studio albums, his latest album being Fallen Embers, which was released in July 2021. Fallen Embers has earned ILLENIUM's first Grammy nomination.


Underneath are albums ILLENIUM have put out so far as of August 2022.
  • Ashes
  • Awake
  • Ascend
  • Fallen Embers
